phc-rollout.userFacingDescription: Roll out the Probabilistic Heap Checker in Firefox Release.

disable-redirects-for-authretries.userFacingDescription: Rollback Redirection of the http channel for Authentication retries.

encrypted-client-hello-fallback-mechanis.userFacingDescription: This experiment enables a fallback mechanism for Encrypted Client Hello. This feature maximizes compatibility with websites that have misconfigured or unexpected DNS configurations.

fpp-floating-point-protection-rollout-li.userFacingName: FPP: Floating Point Protection Rollout (Linux Only)
fpp-floating-point-protection-rollout-li.userFacingDescription: This is a rollout of FPP Floating Point Value protections on Desktop for Linux and Mac so that floating point values cannot be used as a fingerprinting vector between platforms.

fx-accounts-ping-release-rollout-2.userFacingDescription: Enable sending the Fx Accounts ping.

$l10n.text: Didn’t mean to close that tab?
Find and reopen it quickly here. We keep a history of your recently closed tabs for you.

Dismisses message and reduces frequency of message
Primary button label that routes to about:firefoxview

de.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-titl: Haben Sie den gewünschten Tab nicht gefunden?
de.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-b-titl: Sie wollten diesen Tab nicht schließen?
de.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-titl: Haben Sie den gewünschten Tab nicht gefunden?
de.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-subt: Durchsuchen Sie alle Ihre offenen und geschlossenen Tabs, um ihn schnell zu finden.
de.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-b-subt: Hier können Sie sie schnell finden und wieder öffnen. Wir speichern eine Chronik Ihrer kürzlich geschlossenen Tabs für Sie.
de.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-subt: Wir zeigen Ihnen alle geöffneten Tabs in allen Fenstern.

fr.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-titl: Vous ne trouvez pas l’onglet dont vous avez besoin ?
fr.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-b-titl: Vous ne vouliez pas fermer cet onglet ?
fr.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-titl: Vous ne trouvez pas l’onglet dont vous avez besoin ?

fr.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-b-subt: Retrouvez-le et rouvrez-le rapidement ici. Nous conservons un historique des onglets que vous avez récemment fermés.
fr.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-subt: Nous vous affichons tous vos onglets ouverts, dans toutes vos fenêtres.

it.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-a-titl: Non riesci a trovare la scheda che ti serve?
it.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-titl: Non riesci a trovare la scheda che ti serve?

it.fx-view-discoverability-treatment-c-subt: Ti mostreremo tutte le schede aperte, in tutte le finestre.
it.fx-view-discoverability-split-button-opt: Non mostrare di nuovo questo suggerimento

disable-ads-startup-cache.userFacingDescription: Reduce the number of old / out of date ads shown on New Tab

newtab-topic-labels.userFacingDescription: Turn on topic labels for recommended stories on newtab

messages.targeting: isSidebarClosing && 'browser.shopping.experience2023.autoOpen.enabled' | preferenceValue == true && 'browser.shopping.experience2023.optedIn' | preferenceValue == 0 && 'browser.newtabpage.activity-stream.asrouter.userprefs.cfr.features' | preferenceValue != false
messages.skip_in_tests: not tested in automation and might pop up unexpectedly during review checker tests

messages.targeting: !isSidebarClosing && 'browser.shopping.experience2023.autoOpen.enabled' | preferenceValue == true && 'browser.shopping.experience2023.optedIn' | preferenceValue == 0 && 'browser.newtabpage.activity-stream.asrouter.userprefs.cfr.features' | preferenceValue != false && !'messaging-system-action.shopping-callouts-1-block' | preferenceValue && (currentDate | date - messageImpressions.FAKESPOT_CALLOUT_CLOSED_NOT_OPTED_IN_AUTO_OPEN[messageImpressions.FAKESPOT_CALLOUT_CLOSED_NOT_OPTED_IN_AUTO_OPEN | length - 1] | date) / 3600000 > 24
messages.skip_in_tests: not tested in automation and might pop up unexpectedly during review checker tests

tiles.label: Please let us know why you turned off Review Checker. Select multiple if needed.

us-review-checker-rollout-v3.userFacingDescription: We're excited to introduce a "More to Consider" module in Review Checker that will bring users relevant and high quality products related to the one they are looking at, to further help users shop with confidence. Because Review Checker uses OHTTP, it only sees the URL and the product identifier there, not page contents. So, a user's identity, IP address, or any other information besides the product identifier and website domain, are not included in or revealed to Fakespot or Mozilla.

default-ui-experiment.userFacingDescription: Testing alternative UI layouts to highlight content more.

us-rollout-compact-layout-thumbs-updown.userFacingName: US Rollout: Compact Layout + Thumbs Up/Down
us-rollout-compact-layout-thumbs-updown.userFacingDescription: Rollout thumbs up/down feedback with a slightly compacted layout

disabling-chips-for-v131.userFacingDescription: Disabling CHIPS feature for all v131 users due to a google auth login regression

new-tab-region-specific-content-expansio.userFacingDescription: We're showing region-specific content on New Tab

extensions-migration-in-import-wizard-11.userFacingDescription: This rollout makes extension migration available to users migrating from Chrome to Firefox.

subtitle.raw: Sync all your important info with encryption – like bookmarks and passwords. You can pull everything up anywhere you use Firefox.

account-spotlight-modal-english-rollout-.userFacingName: Account spotlight modal - English rollout - V2
account-spotlight-modal-english-rollout-.userFacingDescription: Prompt to remind users to sync their data to a Mozilla account

unified-api-for-spocs-and-top-sites-cont.userFacingName: Unified API for spocs and top sites - controlled rollout for release 133+
unified-api-for-spocs-and-top-sites-cont.userFacingDescription: We're switching to a new endpoint for the services supplying sponsored content and top sites to the new tab. This is a controlled rollout for 133 on the Release channel to that new endpoint.

default-ui-experiment-logo-in-corner-rol.userFacingName: Default UI Experiment - Logo in corner Rollout
default-ui-experiment-logo-in-corner-rol.userFacingDescription: Testing alternative UI layouts to highlight content more.

$l10n.text: Now you can highlight your PDFs!
With our new highlighter tool, you can read and edit PDFs in one place.
$l10n.comment: This string appears below an image of a document with important parts highlighted.

$l10n.text: Make Firefox your default PDF editor?
You’ll have access to our tools every time you open a PDF.
Now you can highlight your PDFs!
With our new highlighter tool, you can read and edit PDFs in one place.
$l10n.comment: This string appears below an image of a document with important parts highlighted.

pdf-annotations-highlight-treatment-b-ro.userFacingName: PDF Annotations - Highlight - Treatment B Rollout
pdf-annotations-highlight-treatment-b-ro.userFacingDescription: This experiment displays a message in the PDF viewer that introduces the highlight toolbar button, and offers users a way to set Firefox as the default PDF handler, if it is not already.

de.screen-1-header: Hervorhebung in PDFs ist ab sofort möglich!
de.screen-2-subtitle: Sie haben jedes Mal Zugriff auf unsere Werkzeuge, wenn Sie eine PDF-Datei öffnen.
de.screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: Mit unserem neuen Textmarker-Werkzeug können Sie PDFs an einem Ort lesen und bearbeiten.

fr.screen-1-header: Vous pouvez désormais surligner vos PDF !
fr.screen-2-header: Faire de Firefox votre éditeur PDF par défaut ?

fr.screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: Avec notre nouvel outil de surlignage, vous pouvez consulter et modifier des fichiers PDF sans avoir besoin d’un autre logiciel.

it.screen-2-header: Impostare Firefox come editor predefinito per i PDF?

content.promoTitle: VPNs aren’t all the same. Some simply aren’t secure. Some log your activity. But Mozilla VPN is different — it’s open source and backed by a company with a track record of putting people and their privacy first.

mozilla-vpn-in-private-browsing-treatmen.userFacingName: Mozilla VPN in Private Browsing - Treatment D Rollout (EN only)
mozilla-vpn-in-private-browsing-treatmen.userFacingDescription:
This is a rollout for the most successful treatment of the Mozilla VPN messaging experiment on PBM (Treatment D):
https://experimenter.services.mozilla.com/nimbus/mozilla-vpn-in-private-browsing/

This rollout is English only and will be followed by another rollout for German, French and Italian:
https://experimenter.services.mozilla.com/nimbus/mozilla-vpn-in-private-browsing-de-fr-it-copy/

$l10n.text: Read and sign docs without leaving Firefox
Now you can draw, type, or upload your signature to Firefox and store it for reuse.
Make Firefox your default PDF editor?
You’ll have access to our tools every time you open a PDF.
Read and sign docs without leaving Firefox
Now you can draw, type, or upload your signature to Firefox and store it for reuse.

pdf-annotations-signatures-ab-experiment.userFacingDescription: This experiment displays a message in the PDF viewer that introduces the signature toolbar button, and offers users a way to open PDFs in Firefox by default.

de.screen-2-subtitle: Sie haben jedes Mal Zugriff auf unsere Werkzeuge, wenn Sie eine PDF-Datei öffnen.
de.highlight-screen-1-header: Hervorhebung in PDFs ist ab sofort möglich!
de.screen-1-variant-2-header: Dokumente lesen und unterschreiben, ohne Firefox zu verlassen
de.screen-1-variant-1-subtitle: Zeichnen, tippen oder laden Sie Ihre Unterschrift hoch und platzieren Sie sie dann an der gewünschten Stelle. Speichern Sie Ihre Standard-Unterschriften für das nächste Mal.
de.screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: Jetzt können Sie Ihre Unterschrift zeichnen, tippen oder in Firefox hochladen und zur Wiederverwendung speichern.
de.highlight-screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: Mit unserem neuen Textmarker-Werkzeug können Sie PDFs an einem Ort lesen und bearbeiten.

fr.screen-2-header: Faire de Firefox votre éditeur PDF par défaut ?
fr.screen-2-subtitle: Vous aurez accès à nos outils à chaque fois que vous ouvrirez un fichier PDF.
fr.highlight-screen-1-header: Vous pouvez désormais surligner vos PDF !
fr.screen-1-variant-2-header: Lisez et signez des documents sans quitter Firefox
fr.screen-1-variant-1-subtitle: Dessinez, saisissez ou téléchargez votre signature, puis placez-la à l’endroit exact voulu. Conservez vos signatures prêtes pour une prochaine fois.
fr.screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: Vous pouvez désormais dessiner, saisir ou télécharger votre signature dans Firefox et la stocker pour la réutiliser.
fr.highlight-screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: Avec notre nouvel outil de surlignage, vous pouvez consulter et modifier des fichiers PDF sans avoir besoin d’un autre logiciel.

it.screen-2-header: Impostare Firefox come editor predefinito per i PDF?
it.screen-2-subtitle: Avrai accesso ai nostri strumenti ogni volta che apri un PDF.
it.highlight-screen-1-header: Ora puoi evidenziare i tuoi PDF!
it.screen-1-variant-1-header: Firma sulla linea tratteggiata, o dove preferisci
it.screen-1-variant-2-header: Leggi e firma documenti senza uscire da Firefox
it.feature-tour-submenu-item-1: Non mostrare di nuovo questo suggerimento
it.screen-1-variant-1-subtitle: Disegna, digita o carica la tua firma, poi inseriscila esattamente dove desideri. Salva le tue firme preferite per riusarle in futuro.
it.screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: Ora puoi disegnare, digitare o caricare la tua firma su Firefox e salvarla per riutilizzarla in futuro.
it.highlight-screen-1-variant-2-subtitle: Grazie al nuovo strumento evidenziatore puoi leggere e modificare i PDF senza bisogno di altri software.

$l10n.text: Add this site to your bookmarks toolbar?
Your bookmark will be saved just below the address bar for quick access.
You can drag and drop tabs here to keep more of your favorite sites within reach.
You can add other sites you visit more often. Simply drag and drop tabs here to keep favorite websites within reach.

recommend-bookmark-toolbar-existing-user.userFacingName: Recommend Bookmark Toolbar - Existing User Rollout
recommend-bookmark-toolbar-existing-user.userFacingDescription: Message Experiment: Recommending the bookmark toolbar

de.treatment-b-subtitle: Ziehe Tabs auf die offene Lesezeichen-Symbolleiste und lege sie ab, um deine Lieblings-Webseiten immer griffbereit zu haben.
de.treatment-c-subtitle: Wir lassen die Symbolleiste geöffnet, damit du Tabs dorthin ziehen kannst und so deine Lieblings-Webseiten immer griffbereit sind.
de.treatment-a-screen-1-subtitle: Ein Lesezeichen wird direkt unter der Adressleiste gespeichert, damit du schnell darauf zugreifen zu kannst.
de.treatment-a-screen-2-accept-subtitle: Zieh Tabs hierher und lege sie ab, um weitere deiner Lieblings-Webseiten griffbereit zu haben.
de.treatment-a-screen-2-decline-subtitle: Füge andere Webseiten hinzu, die du häufiger besuchst. Ziehen Tabs hierher und lege sie ab, um deine Lieblings-Webseiten griffbereit zu haben.

fr.treatment-c-title: Ajouter ce site à la barre personnelle ?
fr.treatment-b-subtitle: Une fois ouverte, vous pouvez glisser-déposer des onglets dans la barre personnelle pour garder vos sites préférés à portée de main.
fr.treatment-c-subtitle: Nous laisserons la barre personnelle ouverte afin que vous puissiez faire glisser des onglets ici et garder vos sites préférés à portée de main.
fr.treatment-a-screen-1-title: Ajouter ce site à la barre personnelle ?
fr.treatment-a-screen-1-subtitle: Votre marque-page sera enregistré juste en dessous de la barre d’adresse pour pouvoir y accéder rapidement.
fr.treatment-a-screen-2-accept-subtitle: Vous pouvez glisser-déposer des onglets ici pour garder davantage de vos sites préférés à portée de main.
fr.treatment-a-screen-2-decline-subtitle: Vous pouvez ajouter d’autres sites que vous visitez souvent. Glissez-déposez simplement des onglets ici pour garder vos sites web préférés à portée de main.

it.treatment-b-title: Mantenere aperta la barra dei segnalibri?
it.treatment-c-title: Aggiungere questo sito alla barra dei segnalibri?
it.treatment-b-subtitle: Quando è aperta, puoi trascinare le schede nella barra dei segnalibri per mantenere i tuoi siti preferiti sempre a portata di mano.
it.treatment-c-subtitle: Manterremo aperta la barra degli strumenti, così potrai trascinarvi le schede e mantenere i tuoi siti preferiti a portata di mano.
it.treatment-a-screen-1-title: Aggiungere questo sito alla barra dei segnalibri?
it.split-dismiss-button-option-1: Non mostrare di nuovo questo suggerimento
it.treatment-a-screen-1-subtitle: Il segnalibro verrà salvato appena sotto la barra degli indirizzi, così da offrirti un accesso più rapido.
it.treatment-a-screen-2-decline-title: Mantenere aperta la barra dei segnalibri?
it.treatment-a-screen-2-accept-subtitle: Puoi trascinare le schede qui per tenere a portata di mano i tuoi siti preferiti.
it.treatment-a-screen-2-decline-subtitle: Puoi aggiungere gli altri siti che visiti più spesso. Basta trascinare le schede qui per mantenere i tuoi siti web preferiti a portata di mano.

en-CA.treatment-c-title: Add this site to your bookmarks toolbar?
en-CA.treatment-b-subtitle: Once open, you can drag and drop tabs onto the bookmarks toolbar to keep your favorite sites within reach.
en-CA.treatment-c-subtitle: We’ll leave the toolbar open so you can drag tabs here and keep your favorite sites within reach.
en-CA.treatment-a-screen-1-title: Add this site to your bookmarks toolbar?
en-CA.treatment-a-screen-1-subtitle: Your bookmark will be saved just below the address bar for quick access.
en-CA.treatment-a-screen-2-accept-subtitle: You can drag and drop tabs here to keep more of your favorite sites within reach.
en-CA.treatment-a-screen-2-decline-subtitle: You can add other sites you visit more often. Simply drag and drop tabs here to keep favorite websites within reach.
